snippet.title: OVERRIDE: MECH CITY BRAWL - PvP Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare to MECH a name for yourself when Override: Mech City Brawl launches on December 4! Pre-order now: http://overridegame.com/#pre-order

Pilot a diverse roster of epic mechs, each with their own play style, special moves, and finishers. Tower over your opponents and lay waste to entire cities underfoot in local and online versus, co-op, ranked 1v1 matches, and more.

Customize your mechs in the Garage, changing their accessories and skins to create your own unique style, and experience Override’s story in a single-player campaign.

Override: Mech City Brawl is coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC on 12/4.

Pre-order now: http://overridegame.com/#pre-order
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/709440/Override_Mech_City_Brawl/
Like on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/OverrideMCB
Follow on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/OverrideMCB
Join the conversation on Discord: http://discord.gg/6p9T7hg
